Posts.Content: HI all, Thanks for the info on the magazine i am going to subscribe be immediately Thanks again  Jazmia
Posts.Title: Vita, The breast cancer magazine.

Posts.Content: Hi LondonLass Oh yes i do recognise myself here and feel exactly how you are doing as a dreadful feeling waiting for results from scans,but hey it is something we must put up with ,not that we want to but have to ,no choice at all ,well i suppose there is a choice but do we want to take that road i dont think so at the moment, so just have to keep giving all others in the same position a helping hand ,well helping mail,and hopefully we can keep smiling  all the best  Renee
Posts.Title: IS THIS YOU?
